name: Kombi The Warm-Up Heated Mitts - Unisex
description: Putting in 9-5 at the ski hill? These Primaloft® heated mitts last up to 8 hours. The heat surrounds your fingers, thumbs and back of hands. Waterproof, breathable leather provide dryness and comfort to keep going all day.Premium leather palms are tough but supple for ease of movement.Waterguard® waterproof, breathable membrane for keeping moisture at bay.Primaloft® Gold insulation provides warmth even when the heating is off.Wrist strap and collar cinch to keep heat in and snow out.Rechargeable lithium-ion batteries included.Battery life is up to 8 hours on low, 5 on medium and 2.5 on high.Battery pocket has a seam-sealed zipper.Wrist leashes.Charging plug included.
